string.value: #p9120001# seemed to be dissatisfied with just having a #t4000066# muffler, and wants something more. What would that be...

It turns out #p9120001# wanted not just a #t4000066# muffler, but a #t4000066# coat. Seriously, why does she need a coat at #m800000000#... This defies anyone's logic, but oh well... How am I going to gather up #b400 #t4000066#s#k?\n\n #t4000066# #b#c4000066#/400
I gave #p9120001# 400 #t4000066#s. I understand her need for pretty things, but wearing a muffler AND a coat at #m800000000#? #p9120001#'s just weird.
어머~ 당신은 전에 #t4000066# 목도리 재료를 구해준 사람 아니야? 반가워~ 호호. 덕분에 목도리를 만들 수 있게 되었어. 그런데 말이야, 뭔가 약간 부족한 것 같은 느낌 안 들어? 이 기모노에는 목도리만이 아니라 코트까지 입어야 완벽할 것 같아. 안 그래? 그렇지?
당신이라면 #t4000066# 구하는 건 어렵지 않을 테니, 좀 구해다 줘~
호호호호~ 역시 친절한 사람이야. 아무래도 코트는 목도리 보다 재료가 많이 필요할 것 같아. #t4000066# 400개만 구해다 줘. 그거면 충분히 만들 수 있을 거야.
뭐야~ 지금까지 구해다 줬으면서 치사하게 그러기야?

Hey, aren't you the one that got me some #t4000066#s for the muffler? Nice to see you~! Thanks to your good work, I was able to make the best muffler in the world! But you know what...? Don't I look like ... something's missing? I mean, look. It just doesn't seem complete. You know what? I think this Kimono needs not just the muffler, but a matching coat! Don't you think so?
Getting #t4000066# should be a piece of cake for you. Please get me some~
Hohoho~ you're so kind. Well, since the coat requires much more materials than the muffler, just get me #b400 #t4000066#s#k. That should be enough for me to make the coat~
Hey, you got me those last time. Why not now? Sheesh...
Hey~! You did get all 400 of the #t4000066#s! I needed a lot of #t4000066# to make the coat, you know...

You are indeed much stronger than your looks may suggest. Seriously, thank you soooo much for all this! This should finally complete the dream look for me. A Kimono, combined with #t4000066# muffler and #t4000066# coat? This screams elegance!
This isn't 400! I need at least 400 to make the coat! Do it right!
